item.title: Count data models
item.description: Count outcome or count data count basically is a number which is discrete and non-negative (integers such as 0,1 or 895 but not 0.6,1.9 or 895.66). It is a number(or sum) of event. This is different to numeric continuous variable which modelled differently (such as blood pressure 120.2,135.9). Count may also have contextual information i.e with time, area or length. Question starting as “How many (events)” generally answered with counts.
